title: MBA CREF 2022 Forecasts a $1T Finance Market in 2022 - GlobeSt.com
content: MBA CREF 2022 Forecasts a $1T Finance Market in 2022  GlobeSt.com
description: During an afternoon general session at MBA CREF, panelists estimated a 13% increase from 2021’s volume of $900 billion and encouraged the audience to “be nimble” going forward.
